patterns.pattern: ^\(Web\)\: (\w+) says, \"(?i:Afflicting|Afflictingway) (\w+): (.*)\.\"$
^\(Web\): (\w+) says, \"(?i:Vinelash|Virulent) (\w+): (\w+)\.\"$
^\(Web\)\: (\w+) says, \"(Battering|Battered) (\w+): (.*)\.\"$
^\(Web\)\: (\w+) says, \"(Whispering|Whisper) (\w+): (.*)\.\"$
^\(Web\)\: (\w+) says, \"(Dictate|Dictating) (\w+): (.*)\.\"$
^\(Web\): (\w+) says, "Afflicting (\w+): (\w+)\. (?:Whispering|Dictating): (\w+), (\w+)\."$
^(\w+) uses Bladefire Vorpal on (\w+)\.$
return isPrompt()
^You take a moment to assess how damaged (\w+)'s limbs are:$
^Confusingly, (\w+) adds a spin afterward and missteps, falling to the ground\.$
^(\w+)('s|') broken legs cause .+ to fall to the ground in a heap\.$
^(\w+) wobbles uncertainly before falling to the ground, .+ leg pulled awkwardly behind .+ own head\.$
^(\w+) leaps up in what is apparently an attempt at a graceful swan dive\. .+ smacks head ?first into the solid ground\.$
^You whistle at .+ and send .+ barreling into (\w+), knocking .+ to the ground\.$
^The injury to (\w+)('s|') knees causes .+ legs to buckle and .+ falls to the ground in a heap\.$
barrels into (\w+) and knocks .+ to the ground\.$
^\w+ \w+ into (\w+), knocking .+ to the ground\.$
^\w connects? and sends? (\w+) sprawling to the floor\.$
^You let forth a forceful howl toward (\w+)\.$
lowers its head and rams it into (\w+) painfully, antlers goring .+ flesh before the beast gives a toss of its great head and sends .+ sprawling unceremoniously to the ground\.$
^Crumpling over in mental agony, (\w+) collapses to the floor and clutches .+ head\.$
^The frenzied air reaches its peak of intensity and slams into (\w+) with a ferocity that knocks .+ to the ground\.$
^(\w+) is blasted backward as you will an expulsion of energy from your staff,the forked blow knocking .+ to the ground\.$
^(\w+)'s? eyes close suddenly as .+ falls asleep\.$
^The tentacle drags (\w+) from the skies and hurls .+ to the ground.$
^(\w+) is unearthed from the ground!$
^An elk lowers its head and rams it into (\w+) painfully, antlers goring .+ flesh before the beast gives a toss of its great head and sends it sprawling unceremoniously to the ground.
^The force of the blow drives (\w+) to .+ knees.$
^Your foot slams into (\w+), knocking \w+ off \w+ feet.$
(\w+) is already upon the ground.
^(\w+) is knocked to the ground by a sudden powerful gust of wind\.$
^(\w+) leaps up in what is apparently an attempt at a graceful swan dive\. .+ smacks head ?first into shallow water\.$
^Being unconscious, (\w+) falls over\.$
^(\w+) appears dizzy and falls to the ground\.$
^(\w+) is already fallen upon the ground\.$

^With a struggle, (\w+) attempts to call upon \w+ willpower reserves, however the effort leaves \w+ looking dizzy and weak. \w+ eyes quickly grow unfocused and .+ sways? slightly before crashing heavily to the ground, and \w+ quickly slips into unconsciousness.$
^A blow knocks (\w+)'s? balance too far from the balls of \w+ feet, bringing \w+ crashing to the ground\.$
^(\w+) is dragged into the location from the \w+ by a thin thread looped around one of \w+ feet\.$
^.+ whips one of its muscular tentacles toward (\w+), sending \w+ toppling to the ground in an unceremonious pile\.$
^The ground beneath you heaves in revolt, casting (\w+) down\.$
^(\w+) stands up and stretches .+ arms out wide\.$
^Rebounding with aggres?sive agility, (\w+) forces \w+ back to \w+ feet.$
^(\w+)'s? eyes close suddenly as \w+ falls asleep\.$
^(\w+) gives in to exhaustion, drifting off to sleep\.$
^(\w+) opens \w+ eyes and yawns mightily\.$
^(\w+) wakes up with a gasp of pain\.$
